# Select

## Props
| Name                                | Type    | Default | Required | Description |
| ----------------------------------- | ------- | ------- | -------- | ----------- |
| multiple                            | Bool    | false   | false    |             |
| [options](#markdown-header-options) | Arrayof | []      | false    |             |

## Complex Props

### options
Type: _Arrayof_

**options** is an array of the following type:

| Name  | Type   | Required |
| ----- | ------ | -------- |
| value | String | false    |
| label | String | false    |
| group | String | false    |
